entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then periods of snow mixed with rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
